description.value: Certain magics in the world flow easily through your sap. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Oaken Resilience] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.One with Plants] as 2nd-rank arcane innate spells once per day each. A tree shape spell you cast this way transforms you into a Large flowering plant like a rosebush or lilac bush instead of a tree.
